column4: hello guys i tried to update my 10.10 to 11 and now it freezes at startup
i am able to drop into root shell and start up gdm from there
but other than that normal boot freezes
sounds like a video card driver problem
ok ill brb going to go check it out
the last thing that it says is NVIDIA using gamma correction and boom EOF
if you hit ctrl+alt+f1 can you return to a console?
or does X just freeze up
where you using the nvidia closed source drivers before?
can you post the Xorg.0.log somewhere?
do you happen to know the command line tool to send files to pastebin>>>???
